message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a good deal, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'm starting with a fair offer, Alice. Let's see if we can both get something we're happy with.
Not bad, but I was hoping for a bit more. I'll wait for a better offer.
You're not getting off that easy, Bob! I'll give you a decent chunk, but don't think you're getting the better end of the deal.
